issue.title: [C++] Add Windows support, Unix static libs for double-conversion package in conda-forge
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3427](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3427). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I don't think this blocks 0.11 packages but we should build using all toolchain dependencies in 0.12
